name: Drunk Visit
description:
After exploring the wonders of the Earth, an alien comes across the humans’ drinking culture. He becomes involved and discovers the power of drunkenness. Using the alcohol to bend reality and change the environment around him, the alien ventures through the night to find his way back to his spaceship.

Controls:
Move with WASD
Drink with Mouse1 or SPACE

Credits:
Alex Rymark Vorm
Julius Bækgaard Brasch
Lina Katrine Zerahn
Per Sikker Hansen
Sissel Angela Ringvad
Steffen Kjærgaard Nielsen
